# https://www.robotstxt.org/robotstxt.html
# Robots.txt for CollegeBuzz

# Allow all web crawlers
User-agent: *
Allow: /

# Specific crawlers
User-agent: Googlebot
Allow: /

User-agent: Bingbot
Allow: /

# Disallow admin and auth pages
Disallow: /login
Disallow: /register

# Sitemap location
Sitemap: https://www.thecollegebuzz.in/sitemap.xml
